text: All of the necessary things that make a great coffee shop are here:   1. good coffee 2. comfy seats 3. tasty treats 4. power outlets  The coffee seriously tastes like they actually cared about the brewing technique and quality of the beans, instead of like other coffee places where quality is a serious after thought.

DISCLAIMER: Cafe Chocolata was a client of mine so I am clearly biased.   You can see two of my Compak K10 espresso grinders in this picture; one of a few reasons the coffee really was good!   The owner retired to the USA.   / Fraser Jamieson
Cute place in Lakeshore with good coffee!
